data.actual_result: You can click it many times and it stays on the screen
data.expected_result: It isn't supposed to stay there and let you click it multiple times as in previous builds
data.short_description: On the latest build, when clicking delete on the kebab menu, you can keep clicking and it stays there
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message - Press the kebab menu - Start pressing delete many times - Observe what happens
